nodes.text: Fnessal was a planet located in the Inner Rim's Fnessal system. It was the homeworld of the sentient Fnessian species, including the smuggler Kn'ik Th'ronik.

Fnessal was first mentioned in West End Games' 1997 Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game sourcebook No Disintegrations. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Fnessal system, and therefore the planet Fnessal, in grid square K-14.
